Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Billy' life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: While threatening Toby , Ian mentions how Billy lied to the group in order to try and kill them all. However, Ian killed him and mounted his skull on his shelf of human skulls full of people he's killed. He shows off the skull to Aaron, Gabriel, Toby, and Jesse while he tells the story.
Death[]: Killed By Ian After attempting to take over Riverbend , Billy was shot in the head by Ian and his skull was mounted on a shelf.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Billy has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Name: Billy Johnson
